description: This Java class is a Spring Boot REST controller that manages authentication endpoints, including registration, login, and token refresh functionalities.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides authentication-related endpoints for user registration, login, and token refresh.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration requests and returns a JWT token upon success.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Processes login requests with email and password, returning a JWT token.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes an existing JWT token and returns a new token.
